dcterms:creator: S. Pradhan
A. Moschitti
N. Xue
O. Uryupina
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: The CoNLL-2012 Shared Task data sets are dedicated to modeling multilingual unrestricted coreference resolution, comprising three languages: Arabic, Chinese, and English. They include coreferring mentions of entities and events, along with various annotation layers such as part-of-speech tags, syntactic parses, word senses, named entities, and semantic roles.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2012 Shared Task data sets

dcterms:creator: R. Weischedel
E. Hovy
M. Marcus
M. Palmer
R. Belvin
S. Pradhan
L. Ramshaw
N. Xue
dcterms:description: The OntoNotes project data sets provide a large training corpus for enhanced processing, including coreference information and various annotation layers.
dcterms:title: OntoNotes project data sets

dcterms:creator: B. Sundheim
R. Grishman
dcterms:description: The MUC-6 corpus provides a definition for the coreference task and is used for evaluating coreference resolution systems.
dcterms:title: MUC-6 corpus

dcterms:creator: G. Doddington
A. Mitchell
M. Przybocki
L. Ramshaw
S. Strassel
R. Weischedel
dcterms:description: The ACE corpus is part of the Automatic Content Extraction program, providing tasks, data, and evaluation for coreference resolution.
dcterms:title: ACE corpus
